description: Smallest square that begins with n.
maple: a:= proc(n) local k,d,x;  if issqr(n) then return n  else for d from 1 do    for k from 0 to 10^d-1 do    x:= 10^d*n+k;    if issqr(x) then return x fi    od    od  fiend proc:seq(a(n),n=1..100); # _Robert Israel_, Jul 31 2014
prog: (Python)n = 1while n < 100:..for k in range(10**3):....if str(k**2).startswith(str(n)):......print(k**2,end=', ')......break..n += 1 # _Derek Orr_, Jul 31 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
